resources.string: I was born on December, 2002 in Polewali. I am currently taking my 4th semester at Hasanuddin University. Besides being active on campus, I am also active in church organizations and studying computer science and some programming languages.

Technology development, graphic design, photography, and website creation are all areas that I am passionate about. As a result, I prefer to put what I already know and have into practice and share it with others so that it might be beneficial.
